channel.title: Ip Ban...Not working
channel.description:
I've got Ipban command and that bannedips file...
Im adding a ip to it..and then thye login the server say
Failed logged in blbla is ipbanned when they try again they can logon with the same ip!?! you can say they are Mass login..to get back on server I want this to stop ip ban = ipbanned And no login anymore Now its ipban = login play logout ban make new char login play ban ect.
HELP plz
